title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator
description: Bug 2529 - The Open/Close project option is not always available in the Navigator. (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting project P2 and attempting to close it, the Open/Close project option is not available in the Navigator.
EB: The Open/Close project option should always be available in the Navigator when a project is selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 2. Select P2 in the Navigator. 3. Attempt to close P2 using the Open/Close project option in the Navigator.
